title: 如何检测玩家是否蹲着然后执行指令？
txt_content: 如题,我的版本是1.12.2，我想检测玩家蹲起的时候执行一条指令

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ⊙u⊙ 于 2019-9-7 11:33 编辑 

创建sneak1记分板，判据为stat.sneakTime
创建sneak2记分板，判据为dummy

###按顺序高频以下命令
/scoreboard players tag @a remove sneak.1
/scoreboard players tag @a remove sneak.2
/scoreboard players tag @a remove sneak.3

#下蹲状态判断
/scoreboard players tag @a[score_sneak1_min=1,score_sneak2_min=0,score_sneak2=0] add sneak.2
/scoreboard players tag @a[score_sneak1_min=1,tag=!sneak.2] add sneak.1
/scoreboard players tag @a[score_sneak1_min=0,score_sneak1=0,score_sneak2_min=1] add sneak.3

#执行
/execute @a[tag=sneak.1] ~ ~ ~ say 持续下蹲
/execute @a[tag=sneak.2] ~ ~ ~ say 开始下蹲
/execute @a[tag=sneak.3] ~ ~ ~ say 结束下蹲

#归位/给下tick做准备
/execute @a ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players operation @s sneak2 = @s sneak1
/scoreboard players set @a sneak1 0复制代码

从自己1.14function包里转回来的1.12命令方块格式
